title: Banned, can't log on to the forums... Region transfer?
body: My main account was banned from the NA server and when I try logging in the server reads,"your account has been transferred to a different region.". I can reset the password with my registered email, but I cannot log on to the forums with the account nor can I submit a ticket to try to dispute the ban (because I can't log in).

replies.body: I can't check to be sure what's going on with your other account without the Summoner name, but if you ever need help with account related details you can always reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Hi Broporo.
The Summoner name is "Bronze 5 prod". I have access to the original email, the username, and can reset the password via email, but for some reason I cannot log on to any of the forum pages on any of the servers.

Weeeiiiird....that summoner name doesn't seem to pull anything up on my end, which even if it was transferred it should still show up as transferred. Go ahead and reach out to those account agents in the ticket I linked, and they should be able to find the account with a little more info. I just don't want all the personal info being out in the open here on the boards.
